name: Scandunt The Robo
description:
You control a robot who fell down a pit. You must climb out faster than the lava reaches you. Don't touch the enemies. (Yes, the enemies are flying fish.)

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK-2021 Jam. The theme was "Joined-Together"

Controls:

Wasd / Arrows - control a hand

Space - switch between hands.

Team Members:

+ Totally: Code | Art | Overall design.

+ TheoTheTorch:  Code| Music | Overall design.

Credits:

+ Markositta: Being awesome | Help with music program.

+ Game Engine: Godot

+ Font: Minecraftory

+ SFX: Yal's SFX | freesound
